articles.author: Annika Kim Constantino
articles.title: The Trump administration is changing Covid, childhood vaccine recommendations – here’s what it means for you - CNBC
articles.description: Several health experts say there are steps Americans can take to navigate the new guidance and try to secure the vaccines they or their children want or need.
articles.content: A proposed vote by Massachusetts Institute of Technology professor Retsef Levi is displayed during an Advisory Committee on Immunization Practices (ACIP) meeting at the Centers for Disease Control an… [+16379 chars]
